channel.title: Chapter 03: Regularization on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 03: Regularization on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 03.01: Basic Regularization
item.description: In this section we discuss regularized cost functions, norm penalties, weight decay, and equivalence with constrained optimization.

item.title: Chapter 03.02: Regularization in Non-Linear Models and Bayesian Priors
item.description: In this section, we motivate regularization from a Bayesian perspective.

item.title: Chapter 03.03: Geometric Analysis of L2 Regularization and Weight Decay
item.description: In this section, we provide a geometric understanding of \(L2\) regularization, showing how parameters are shrunk according to the eigenvalues of the Hessian of empirical risk, and discuss its correspondence to weight decay.

item.title: Chapter 03.04: Early Stopping
item.description: In this section, we introduce early stopping and show how it can act as a regularizer.

item.title: Chapter 03.05: Discriminant Analysis
item.description: In this section, we explain ensemble method, dropout and data augmentation.
